title: How to Sell a Nonrefundable Hotel Room on Roomer

steps.headline: Make sure your reservation is non-refundable and prepaid, and that you will not be using it.
steps.description: Double check with the hotel that the reservation is in fact nonrefundable. If it turns out to be nonrefundable, you've come to the right place!

steps.headline: Visit Roomer.
steps.description: Go to the homepage on https://www.roomertravel.com and click on the SELL button on the upper right of the page.

steps.headline: Submit your reservation on Roomertravel.
steps.description: All you have to do is submit a few details about your reservation and forward Roomer the initial confirmation e-mail.

steps.headline: Await a confirmation email that your room has been posted.
steps.description: Roomer reviews your submission, and once approved, displays your room for sale with images, tripadvisor review and all relevant information for your hotel.

steps.headline: Get paid once the room is bought.
steps.description: When someone books your reservation, the system contacts the hotel or booking agency in order to transfer the name on the reservation. You don’t have to do a thing ! Guests pay through Roomer when they book your reservation and Roomer's Payment Guarantee ensures direct payment to you through their secure payment platform.
